xMatixDataFabrics.title: xMatix Data Fabric
xMatixDataFabrics.description1: Connect, normalize, and govern data across systems in real time, without creating another data silo.
xMatixDataFabrics.description2: Bring together transactional data, master data, and events into a single operational view that powers real-time execution and intelligence across every xMatix module.

whatIsIt.title: What it is
whatIsIt.description2:
xMatix Data Fabric is a unified operational data layer that connects transactional data, master data, and events across all xMatix modules. 
 It provides a consistent, trusted data foundation that workflows, rules, and intelligence can act on in real time, without duplicating data or disrupting existing systems of record.

whyItMatters.title: Why It Matters
whyItMatters.description2:
Traditional enterprise systems fragment data by function, creating gaps in context as work moves across teams and systems. 
 xMatix Data Fabric preserves operational context across processes by maintaining shared domain data models and real-time data synchronization. This enables faster execution, better decisioning, and intelligence that operates on complete, current information.

coreCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
coreCapabilities.description: These shared data capabilities ensure consistent execution, trusted insights, and governed automation across domains.

coreCapabilitiesCard1.title: Policy Enforcement
coreCapabilitiesCard1.content: Ensure business rules, approvals, and controls are consistently enforced across all workflows.

coreCapabilitiesCard2.title: Audit & Compliance
coreCapabilitiesCard2.content: Maintain full traceability of execution, decisions, and changes for regulatory compliance.

coreCapabilitiesCard3.title: Configurable Automation
coreCapabilitiesCard3.content: Adapt workflows and logic quickly without redeploying rigid systems.

coreCapabilitiesCard4.title: Time-based Orchestration
coreCapabilitiesCard4.content: Trigger actions, SLAs, and escalations using real-time and scheduled events.

worksWith.title: Works With
worksWith.description: All xMatix modules run on the same execution platform. Sales, Service, Warehouse, Inventory, Procurement, Finance, Payroll, People, and Partners share a common foundation for workflows, data context, & governance

requestADemo.heading: Unify data without rebuilding systems
requestADemo.description: Create a shared operational data foundation while keeping existing CRM, ERP, and operational systems intact.
